clean_tray.description: Clean the microwave tray to remove any food particles.

close_microwave_door.description: Close the microwave door by swinging it to the closed position.

open_microwave_door.description: Open the microwave door by swinging it to the opened position.

close_microwave_door.description: The microwave door is already closed.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob to adjust the microwave settings.

clean_knob.description: Clean the knob to ensure smooth operation.

clean_microwave_body.description: Clean the body of the microwave to remove any dust or particles.

clean_whole_microwave.description: Clean the entire microwave including the body, door, knob, and tray.

use_microwave.description: Open the door, place the item on the tray, close the door, rotate the knob to start.
